fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose to disrupt a Striked player, stealing their night feedback messages and giving them an ability fail message.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes are announced the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If two or more Striked players are alive, gain Basic defense.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, you may additionally give them any message you choose at the end of the night
